title: The Real George Carlin
description: The special "The Real George Carlin" has not been shown since it first aired, and the set also features Apt 2C, a pilot he made for HBO in the Eighties that never made it to air, as well as two rare, one-hour standup routines. Additionally, it includes clips from Carlinâ€™s early days on Talent Scouts, The Jackie Gleason Show and Hollywood Palace. Patton Oswalt wrote the liner notes for the release.
